title: The Bald Eagle: The Improbable Journey of America’s Bird
content: The Bald Eagle: The Improbable Journey of America’s Bird by DavisJack E.. 2022. Liveright Publishing Company, New York, New York, USA. pp., 48 photos and illustrations. $29.95 (hardcover), ISBN 9781631495250, $20.00 (paperback). ISBN 9781324094104, $3.99 (epub), ISBN 978163495267.
